titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of West Virginia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 5/18/2000--Introduced. Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend until September 26, 2003, the time period during which the licensee of a specified hydroelectric project in West Virginia is required to commence construction. Requires reinstatement of such license if it has expired.
